messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

please create account for to all read only access our oracle clone tracking document december pm hi please create clone tracking document located thanks december re hi link presented form regards december re hi error seeing december re hi user clone tracking document please document thanks december re hi believe please clone planned analyst conscious topic clones created clone tracking document which located please ensure top letting per normal clone requests recorded document going forward thanks december hi gents analysts working which requires him create rule invoice approvals test environment affect re underway he continue his work kind regards platinum specialized disclaimer

message.reasoning:
**Categorizing IT Ticket**

I need to categorize an IT ticket based on a list including "Hardware," "HR Support," "Access," and more. This one has a long, noisy message discussing creating an account for read-only access to an Oracle clone tracking document. It seems clear that the user is requesting access. There's also mention of something about analysts and test environments, which looks like a different issue. Still, the main focus should be on granting read-only access.{"category":"Access"}
